author: Simon Difford
description: This cocktail sits somewhere in the East River between a Manhattan and a Brooklyn with some Thames Estuary thrown in.
name: Bruised Pomegranate
recipeIngredient: 45 ml Straight rye whiskey (100 proof / 50% alc./vol.)
2 Saline solution 4:1 (20g sea salt to 80g water)

recipeInstructions.text: THROW all ingredients with ice and strain into chilled glass
